description: Try our easy to follow Korean-Style Beef Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef burger,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Dairy free
name: Korean-Style Beef Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all burger ingredients except oil. Form into patties and place on a lined tray, refrigerate for 30 minutes to set. Mix mayonnaise, chilli paste and sugar in a small dish.

Brush patties on both sides with oil and cook over medium heat – in a heavy-based skillet or on a pre-heated barbecue – for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked through. Transfer to a clean plate and cover loosely with foil to keep warm.
Place lettuce on plates, top with cucumber, carrot and burgers. Top with mayo and kimchi. Serve with steamed rice on the side.
